name: T - Emma Emily
_source: speak;Emily; Come on Emma, you can't stay quiet forever.{w} You'll have to talk to me eventually!
speak;Emily; Would saying that I'm sorry make you feel better?
speak;Emily; Ugh, why do you have to be like that?{w} Pull yourself together already!
speak;Emily; I'm going to actually act like I care about my hometown burning down.
